snippet.title: I Remade a Classic Platformer Engine
snippet.description:
The classic platformer series Klonoa means a lot to me, and during my work on my game design abilities I wanted to practice by recreating it in Godot. This video showcases what has been implemented, how exactly it all works, and my reasons for doing this project in the first place!

Link to the playable prototype: https://the8bitleaf.itch.io/klonoa-project-moonlight-prototype
